AI_AGENT.TITLE: AI Agent
AI_AGENT.DESCRIPTION: Create AI-powered assistants for your team

EMPTY.TITLE: You haven't created any AI Agent topics yet
EMPTY.DESCRIPTION: Create AI Agent topics to assist your team with common inquiries.

TOPICS.TITLE: All Topics
TOPICS.FORM_DESCRIPTION: Name your topic, describe its purpose, and it will help organize your knowledge base for your users. Your agents will be able to find information more easily.
TOPICS.EMPTY_DESCRIPTION: Create topics to organize your AI Agent knowledge

EMPTY_STATE.TITLE: No topics available
EMPTY_STATE.SUBTITLE: Create a topic to provide quick and accurate responses to your users. It can learn from your help articles and past conversations.

FEATURE_SPOTLIGHT.TITLE: Organize your knowledge with Topics
FEATURE_SPOTLIGHT.NOTE: Create topics to categorize your knowledge and make it easier for agents to find relevant information.

TOPICS.NO_TOPICS_DESCRIPTION: Create a topic to provide quick and accurate responses to your users. It can learn from your help articles and past conversations.

INBOXES.DESCRIPTION: Connect this topic to inboxes where it should be available
INBOXES.NO_LINKED: No inboxes linked to this topic

DELETE.TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this topic?
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: This action is permanent. Deleting this topic will remove it from all connected inboxes and permanently erase all generated knowledge.
DELETE.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: The topic has been successfully deleted
DELETE.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error deleting the topic, please try again.

CREATE.TITLE: Create a topic
CREATE.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: The topic has been successfully created
CREATE.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error creating the topic, please try again.

EDIT.TITLE: Update the topic
EDIT.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: The topic has been successfully updated
EDIT.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error updating the topic, please try again.
EDIT.NOT_FOUND: Could not find the topic. Please try again.

DOCUMENTS.TITLE: Knowledge Base
DOCUMENTS.EMPTY_DESCRIPTION: Upload documents to enhance your AI Agent's knowledge

FEATURE_SPOTLIGHT.TITLE: Enhance your knowledge with Documents
FEATURE_SPOTLIGHT.NOTE: Upload documents to provide your AI Agent with comprehensive information to answer customer questions.

DELETE.TITLE: Delete Document
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this document? This action is permanent and will erase all related knowledge.

DOCUMENTS.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

RESPONSES.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
RESPONSES.EMPTY_DESCRIPTION: Create responses to common questions for your AI Agent

FEATURE_SPOTLIGHT.TITLE: Create pre-defined responses for common questions
FEATURE_SPOTLIGHT.NOTE: Create custom responses to frequently asked questions to help your AI Agent provide accurate answers.

RESPONSES.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this response?

EDIT.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error updating the response

BULK_APPROVE.ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error approving the responses

LIMITS.UPGRADE: Upgrade your plan for additional limits

FEATURE_FLAG.UNAVAILABLE: AI Agent is not available on your current plan
FEATURE_FLAG.UPGRADE: Upgrade to access AI Agent features

PAYWALL.TITLE: Upgrade to use AI Agent
PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: AI Agent is not available on the free plan.
PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade your plan to get access to our assistants, copilot and more.
PAYWALL.CANCEL_ANYTIME: You can change or cancel your plan anytime

ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.AVAILABLE_ON: AI Agent AI feature is only available in a paid plan.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.UPGRADE_PROMPT: Upgrade your plan to get access to our assistants, copilot and more.
ENTERPRISE_PAYWALL.ASK_ADMIN: Please reach out to your administrator for the upgrade.

BANNER.RESPONSES: You've used over 80% of your response limit. To continue using AI Agent, please upgrade.
BANNER.DOCUMENTS: Document limit reached. Upgrade to continue using AI Agent.
